name: cah-committee-cpt
description: A WordPress custom post type for CAH Committees

scripts.minify: npx node-minify --compressor terser --input ./src/js/cah-committees.js --output ./js/cah-committees.min.js && npx node-minify --compressor terser --input ./src/js/cah-committees-admin.js --output ./js/cah-committees-admin.min.js && npx node-minify --compressor clean-css --input ./src/css/cah-committees-admin.css --output ./css/cah-committees-admin.min.css

author: Mike W. Leavitt
